message.content:
Based on the provided credit specifications and applicant profiles, here's the ranking from most suitable (#1) to least suitable (#12):

1. Vlora Hoti (Rank #1)
- Highest bank account balance (70,000 CHF)
- From Zug, which is a financially strong canton
- Senior Software Engineer at Google
- Strong, stable employment
- No debt collection cases

2. José Martinez (Rank #2)
- Stable employment at Swiss Red Cross
- Balanced own funds distribution
- No debt collection cases

3. Beatriz Martins (Rank #3)
- Highest bank account balance after Vlora (65,000 CHF)
- Lawyer at a bank, indicating financial literacy
- No debt collection cases

4. Cristina Lopez (Rank #4)
- Stable engineering role at Stadler Rail
- Well-distributed own funds
- No debt collection cases

5. Markus Fischer (Rank #5)
- Senior Civil Engineer
- Stable employment
- Moderate own funds distribution

6. Ibrahim Öztürk (Rank #6)
- IT Security Consultant
- Good own funds variety
- No debt collection cases

7. Nikola Živković (Rank #7)
- Finance professional at Swiss Post
- Balanced own funds
- No debt collection cases

8. Maria Schmid (Rank #8)
- Architect at renowned firm
- Slightly lower bank account balance
- No debt collection cases

9. Songül Şahin (Rank #9)
- Private Banking professional
- Slightly lower 2nd pillar balance
- No debt collection cases

10. Alban Berisha (Rank #10)
- Auditor at KPMG
- Lower bank account balance
- No debt collection cases

11. Paulo Martins (Rank #11)
- Pharmacist
- Lower bank account balance
- No debt collection cases

12. Marija Pavlović (Rank #12)
- Government employee
- Lowest 2nd pillar balance
- No debt collection cases

context.systems_message:

- Purchase Price incl. Planned Investments: 1'090'000 CHF
- Own Funds: 218'000 CHF

- Fixed-Rate Mortgage Online, 10 Years: 436'000, 1.740%
